name: Trijam 152 - Leave me alone!
description:
More a tech demo than a game, trying a new art style.

How to play:

  • Press UP to evade the brutes.
    Your character hides for 5 seconds, then resumes walking.
  • Best played with Windows or Linux version.
    Html version may be a bit choppy.
    Beware: Linux version not tested.

Font: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Patrick+Hand
